creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Final request, can you test with nightly build ?

http://ci.apache.org/projects/jmeter/nightlies/



Installing JMeter runtime
Download the _bin and _lib files
Unpack the archives into the same directory structure
The other archives are not needed to run JMeter. 

Thanks

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Also you test is very short (30s), could you make it last 1 minute and add a startup delay of 10 s ?

Are you running jmeter from same machine as PHP ?
Monday because I'm not at work ;)

creator: lucas.pouzac.pro@gmail.com
text:
Maybe, could you add value for "enabled" attribute which allow disable ResultCollector (and more ?) with non gui mode automaticaly ?

By example : 
 - enabled = true (already enable)
 - enabled = false (already disable)
 - enabled = gui (only gui mode)

Hello Lucas,
First many thanks for your investigations.

Second:
- Did you make tests using HC3
- In Test 2, did you make tests with current trunk ?

Your idea seems to me good one at first look, could you open another Bugzilla for it ?


How must we understand this:
"My tests do not show, in fact, real problems.

I still continues an analysis as I see all the same degradation following the transition to version 2.9 on my application scenarios."

I understand this:
- The following tests mentionned here do not show problems
- But you have degradations following transition to version 2.9 on your app scenarios ?

If so maybe open a discussion on user list, maybe you can have some help.
